heading: HR00601
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION TO CONDUCT PRELIMINARY PROBE TO CHECK IF THERE HAD BEEN GOVERNMENT FAILURE ON THE INABILITY OF THE LAND TRANSPORTATION FRANCHISING AND REGULATORY BOARD TO CURB THE PROLIFERATION OF MULTIPLE-FRANCHISE GRANTS TO BUS COMPANIES THEREBY BETRAYING THE INTENT AND SPIRIT OF THE FRANCHISE LAW
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2017-01-17
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00601
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION TO CONDUCT PRELIMINARY PROBE TO CHECK IF THERE HAD BEEN GOVERNMENT FAILURE ON THE INABILITY OF THE LAND TRANSPORTATION FRANCHISING AND REGULATORY BOARD TO CURB THE PROLIFERATION OF MULTIPLE-FRANCHISE GRANTS TO BUS COMPANIES THEREBY BETRAYING THE INTENT AND SPIRIT OF THE FRANCHISE LAW
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2016-12-05
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION ON 2017-01-17
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2016-12-12;
